attributes.review: I woke up in this Gen Z body with a mission. I will fulfill that mission with my fellow Gen Z people. This app crashed my phone every time I turn it on the number get bigger. I need them smaller, it’s gonna be HUGE. Hated it!!!!!

attributes.review: Fake news! Thy said dogs are chickens. Along with saying trump is the best president which in an absolute LIE! Do not get this app! It had various bugs including trump that we need to get rid of.

attributes.review: anyway i opened this app and almost had a heart attack bc of the absolute disgustingness i saw. there was a naked orange Cheeto man dancing right on my screen, and when i closed out of the app, the Cheeto man had become my wallpaper. DO NOT DOWNKOAD!
attributes.title: EW😹

attributes.review: I got this app, then a pickle attacked me saying, “HOW DARE YOU! THIS APP ENCOURAGES PEOPLE TO EAT ME!” And then it told me that it’s sister, petunia the pickle got EATEN because she downloaded the app! How terrible! We need to spread pickle awareness! I can’t believe that this app wants pickles to become ENDANGERED!!! Pickles deserve to live 🥺🥺
attributes.title: THE WORST

attributes.review: I saw an oversized Cheeto and was horribly scared. The great Trumpkin’s app stunk. There was no reason why this is even an app. I didn’t find any thing that would want me to vote for trump. He’s not getting my vote in the 2020 election 😡
